description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Save Great Britain from the biggest threat it has faced since the Beatles broke up! Fight aliens alone or cooperatively in this very British puzzle shooter. Kill lots of aliens to unlock power ups and extra play modes, including a jolly good fun level editor. Also includes realistic British weather, with a 1 in 4 chance that it will be raining whenever you play!
